raw akas.title: Τα Χρονικά των Κυνηγών Σκιών: Θανάσιμα Εργαλεία

akas: Τα Χρονικά των Κυνηγών Σκιών: Θανάσιμα Εργαλεία Greece
Shadowhunters: The Mortal Instruments USA (alternative title)
akas from release info: Τα Χρονικά των Κυνηγών Σκιών: Θανάσιμα Εργαλεία Greece
Shadowhunters: The Mortal Instruments USA (alternative title)

1.title: On Infernal Ground
1.plot: Secrets abound as the Shadowhunters and Downworlders try to get back to normal after Valentine's death. Clary struggles with keeping her secret about Raziel's wish, while Alec pushes Jace to come clean about whatever Jace and Clary are hiding. Luke must use tough love to keep his secret hidden from Ollie who is on a war path for answers. And Magnus hides his true feelings about his new position in the Warlock community from Alec. Meanwhile, Lilith sets a plan in motion in New York City as Simon spend stime in the Seelie Court.

2.title: The Powers That Be
2.plot: With the institute under siege by a greater demon, tensions between shadowhunters and warlocks are higher than ever as Alec tries to remain in control of the situation.

3.title: What Lies Beneath
3.plot: Simon tries to enter the Seelie realm whilst Raphael faces a heartbreaking loss. Jace has a suspicion about who this new, unknown Greater Demon may be, which has been nicknamed the Owl. Alec hosts a family dinner with help from Magnus.

4.title: Thy Soul Instructed
4.plot: Alec doubles his efforts to find the Owl. Jace begins to fear his hallucinations may hold roots in his past and turns to Luke for guidance.

5.title: Stronger Than Heaven
5.plot: Someone is out to get Simon and Jace is on the hunt to find out who it is, meanwhile Clary turns to Luke to find a way to help Jace. Alec worries about the future of his relationship after learning more about Magnus' romantic past.

6.title: A Window into an Empty Room
6.plot: Clary teams up with Magnus to investigate a recent demon attack. Simon is stunned when he's visited by someone he never thought he'd see again, and who now won't seem to leave. Meanwhile, Izzy worries about dinner with her family and a special guest and Luke reaches out to Maryse.

7.title: Salt in the Wound
7.plot: With the Owl's identity revealed, Alec, Isabelle, and Clary head to Alicante to try and find a way to stop him. Luke and Simon team up to track Lilith's latest possible victim. Maia reflects on her past.

8.title: A Heart of Darkness
8.plot: Clary awaits judgment while imprisoned by the Clave. Magnus, Alec and Isabelle try to save Jace. Simon learns more about the queen of Edom.

9.title: Familia Ante Omnia
9.plot: Clary offers the Clave something it wants in return for sparing her life, with disastrous results. Simon's past returns to haunt him and his family.

10.title: Erchomai
10.plot: Simon makes a heartbreaking choice to protect his family. Magnus asks his father for help. The Shadowhunters prepare for a showdown with Lilith.

11.title: Lost Souls

1.title: The Mortal Cup
1.plot: On her birthday, Clary Fray discovers she descends from a long line of Shadowhunters: human angel hybrids who hunt down demons.

2.title: The Descent Into Hell Isn't Easy
2.plot: Clary and Simon familiarize themselves with the Institute and learn more about the Circle and the hidden world. Clary has visions and tries looking for Dot, who can get her memories back.

3.title: Dead Man's Party
3.plot: Jace trains Clary so that she can join the rescue mission to free Simon from the Vampire Clan.

4.title: Raising Hell
4.plot: Clary consults High Warlock, Magnus Bane, in an attempt to free her memories from a Greater Demon.

5.title: Moo Shu to Go
5.plot: Clary, Alec and Simon head off to Clary's apartment to search for clues about the disappearance of Jocelyn and the Mortal Cup.

6.title: Of Men and Angels
6.plot: With Luke on the verge of death, Clary must act fast before it is too late. Clary also discovers the truth about her family.

7.title: Major Arcana
7.plot: Armed with the knowledge of the Mortal Cup's location, Clary and the team race to get it before it ends up in the wrong hands.

8.title: Bad Blood
8.plot: Clary is forced to make a devastating decision, whilst Alec and Isabelle deal with an envoy from the Clave.

9.title: Rise Up
9.plot: After an attack, the Institute is on high alert. This forces Jace, Clary, Isabelle and the Downworlders to take drastic actions.

10.title: This World Inverted
10.plot: After getting a tip from Meliorn, Clary must venture into an alternate universe. But can she act fast enough before she loses herself in this new world?

11.title: Blood Calls to Blood
11.plot: After receiving information from an old ally, Clary, Jace and Luke devise a plan to find Jocelyn. Meanwhile, the Inquisitor arrives for Isabelle's trial.

12.title: Malec
12.plot: Struggling with the revelation of their shared pasts, Jace and Clary avoid close contact while working with Magnus to track down warlock Ragnor Fell, who may hold the key to waking up the comatose Jocelyn.

13.title: Morning Star
13.plot: Time is running out for the Shadowhunters to stop Valentine. Jace wrestles with his feelings, whilst Alec must deal with the aftermath of his choices.

1.title: This Guilty Blood
1.plot: The Institute is in upheaval after Jace departs with Valentine. Clary, Alec and Isabelle are desperate to find Jace. Jocelyn has a lot to catch up on, now that she's awake.

2.title: A Door Into the Dark
2.plot: Clary struggles to find where she belongs in the world, whilst Simon seeks Magnus' help to track down Camille.

3.title: Parabatai Lost
3.plot: Everyone is on the hunt for Jace, but all for their own reasons. Clary and the team must reach him before anyone else does.

4.title: Day of Wrath
4.plot: Clary continues to struggle with the new Shadowhunter order as Jace is being held in the City of Bones.

5.title: Dust and Shadows
5.plot: Clary takes desperate and extreme actions after the attack on the Institute leaves her devastated.

6.title: Iron Sisters
6.plot: Clary and Isabelle are sent on a mission to meet the Iron Sisters in order to find more clues about Valentine's plans.

7.title: How Are Thou Fallen
7.plot: Clary and Luke find themselves at odds with the arrival of Luke's sister, Cleo.

8.title: Love Is a Devil
8.plot: Alec introduces Magnus to Max during the big Rune Ceremony. Simon makes a bold move as Isabelle finds an unlikely new ally.

9.title: Bound by Blood
9.plot: Clary must grapple with the activation of Iris's blood oath, while Isabelle becomes more intimate with Raphael.

10.title: By the Light of Dawn
10.plot: With the fate of the Downworld hanging in the balance, Clary and Jace face Valentine in the ultimate confrontation.

11.title: Mea Maxima Culpa
11.plot: The downworlders retaliate after Valentine's attacks. The New York institute deals with the repercussions Valentine caused. New faces immerge from the shadows to help the Shadowhunters.

12.title: You Are Not Your Own
12.plot: As Valentine and Magnus try to escape the prison, Jace deals with a new identity, and the Shadowhunters face a possible uprising of the Downworld.

13.title: Those of Demon Blood
13.plot: The Institute's leaders fear a Downworlder uprise when Shadowhunters begin turning up dead at an alarming rate.

14.title: The Fair Folk
14.plot: Alec has big plans to mend fences with the Downworlders; Jace and Clary are summoned by the Seelie Queen.

15.title: A Problem of Memory
15.plot: Simon goes down a dark path while Alec and team prepares to transport Valentine.

16.title: Day of Atonement
16.plot: Clary and Jace go on an unsanctioned mission, whilst Maia helps Simon with his Yom Kippur family dinner.

17.title: A Dark Reflection
17.plot: Clary and the team search for the final Mortal Instrument, whilst Isabelle fears Max is growing up too fast. Maia struggles with her feelings for Simon.

18.title: Awake, Arise, or Be Forever Fallen
18.plot: After a devastating attack at The Institute, everyone is on high alert as the Shadowhunters close in on their hunt for Jonathan. Meanwhile, Simon and Maia help a new downworlder as the Seelie Queen demands an answer from Magnus and Luke.

19.title: Hail and Farewell
19.plot: With Valentine and Sebastian on the loose, the Downworlders come together to make a surprising choice.

20.title: Beside Still Water
20.plot: Jace and Clary rush to make a final stand, but when a traitor is revealed, they may have a bigger fight on their hands than expected. Meanwhile, Alec and Izzy must fight off a large mass of demons that have unexpectedly shown up.

locations: University of Toronto Scarborough, Scarborough, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Metropolitan United Church - 56 Queen Street East, Toronto, Ontario, Canada::(Shadowhunters Institute)
imdb.plot outline: Clary Fray is a normal teenager living in Brooklyn with her mother. One day, she discovers that she is descended from a line of Shadowhunters; humans born with angelic blood that fight to protect our world from demons. After her mother is kidnapped, Clary must team up with three Shadowhunters: Jace, Alec and Isabelle and her best friend Simon on a quest to find her mother and recover her past.
imdb.title: Shadowhunters: The Mortal Instruments
plot: After her mother disappears, Clary must venture into the dark world of demon hunting, and embrace her new role among the Shadowhunters.::Fizz_Y123

Clary Fray is a normal teenager living in Brooklyn with her mother. One day, she discovers that she is descended from a line of Shadowhunters; humans born with angelic blood that fight to protect our world from demons. After her mother is kidnapped, Clary must team up with three Shadowhunters: Jace, Alec and Isabelle and her best friend Simon on a quest to find her mother and recover her past.::Emma Wolfe

Demons, warlocks, werewolves, vampires and more. All the things of legend.... At least that's what Clary Fray thinks - until she learns that these things are not only real, but she must descend into their dark world if she wants to save her mother.

Clary Fray's life couldn't be more mundane. That is, until her 18th birthday when she witnesses 3 teenagers murder a group of monsters. Clary soon learns that she is a Shadowhunter, a half-angel being that protects humans from demons. When her mother is kidnapped by a group called The Circle, Clary and her new Shadowhunters friends (Jace Wayland and the Lightwood siblings), plus her oldest and best friend Simon will stop at nothing to get her back and save the Shadow World from danger.

Shadowhunters follows 18-year-old Clary Fray, who finds out on her birthday that she is not who she thinks she is but rather comes from a long line of Shadowhunters - human-angel hybrids who hunt down demons. When her mother, Jocelyn, is kidnapped, Clary is thrown into the world of demon hunting with mysterious Shadowhunter Jace and her best friend, Simon. Now living among faeries, warlocks, vampires and werewolves, Clary begins a journey of self-discovery as she learns more about her past and what her future may hold.::ahmetkozan
synopsis: Clary Fray (Kat Mcnamara) lives with her mother (Maxim Roy), Jocelyn, in their humble New York apartment. She spends her days working on her art and hanging out with her best friend Simon Lewis (Alberto Rosende). When the two head out to the Pandemonium Club, Clary sees a murder that no one else can see or will believe. When Clary returns home she is attacked by a demon but luckily the Shadowhunters find her and save her. When they discover that Clary is a Shadowhunter herself, Jace Wayland (Dom Sherwood), Alec (Matthew Daddario), and Izzy (Emeraude Toubia) Lightwood help her discover herself and find Clary's mother who was kidnapped. Jocelyn's best friend, Luke Garroway (Isaiah Mustafa), has also suddenly turned his back on her. With the help of the Silent Brothers, Magnus Bane (Harry Shum Jr.)- the High Warlock of Brooklyn, and the Shadowhunter resources like the Institute and one of its caretakers (Hodge Starkweather played by Jon Cor); Clary must discover herself while possibly saving the Shadowrealm from her father (Alan Van Sprang) who turns out to be a once powerful cult leader. Her father is also the most wanted man in the Downworld and was presumed dead until recently not to mention that he has Jocelyn held captive and is the father of the guy that Clary loves! The show is based off of the YA novels by Cassandra Clare (titled "The Mortal Instruments") and will not be related to the movie from 2013 of the same name.
